com.esri.mo2.ui.qry
Class QueryBuilder

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--javax.swing.JComponent
                    |
                    +--javax.swing.JPanel
                          |
                          +--com.esri.mo2.ui.qry.QueryBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Accessible, ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable
public class QueryBuilder
extends JPanel

The QueryBuilder class provides a complete query where clause builder interface that includes an attribute list table. Instances of this class contain a QueryBuilderLight component to support basic where clause construction. This class provides additional functions such as attribute display and feature selection.

Note: Date objects are read/displayed relative to GMT0.

See Also:
QueryBuilderLight, Serialized Form
